flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweetnpollen of flowers. If you want to seenthis POKéMON, just leave a pottedfflower by an open window. BEAUTIFLYnis sure to come looking for pollen.
BEAUTIFLY has a long mouth like a coilednneedle, which is very convenient forncollecting pollen from flowers.fThis POKéMON rides the spring winds asnit flits around gathering pollen.
Its colorfully patterned wings are itsnmost prominent feature. It flies throughnflower-covered fields collecting pollen.nIt attacks ferociously when angered.
Despite its appearance, it has annaggressive nature. It attacks by jabbingnwith its long, thin mouth.
Despite its appearance, it has annaggressive nature. It attacks by jabbingnwith its long, thin mouth.
It has an aggressive nature. Itnstabs prey with its long, narrownmouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
When flower fields bloom, it flitsnaround, collecting pollen. Despitenits appearance, it is savage.
Despite its looks, it is aggressive.nIt jabs with its long, thin mouth ifndisturbed while collecting pollen.
Vibrantly patterned wings are itsnprominent feature. It sucks sweetnflower nectar with its long mouth.
Vibrantly patterned wings are itsnprominent feature. It sucks sweetnflower nectar with its long mouth.
Malgré les apparences, il est trèsnagressif et attaque avec sa trompenquand on le dérange.
Despite its looks, it is aggressive.nIt jabs with its long, thin mouth ifndisturbed while collecting pollen.
Malgré les apparences, il est trèsnagressif et attaque avec sa trompenquand on le dérange.
Despite its looks, it is aggressive.nIt jabs with its long, thin mouth ifndisturbed while collecting pollen.
Despite its looks, it is aggressive.nIt jabs with its long, thin mouth ifndisturbed while collecting pollen.
Despite its looks, it is aggressive.nIt jabs with its long, thin mouth ifndisturbed while collecting pollen.
いろ　あざやかな　はねの　もようがnとくちょう。ほそい　くちを　のばしてnはなの　あまい　ミツを　すいとる。
색이 선명한 날개의 무늬가n특징이다. 가는 입을 뻗어n꽃의 달콤한 꿀을 흡수한다.
Réputé pour les motifs de ses ailes aux couleurs vives.nIl allonge sa trompe pour butiner le nectar.
Die bunten Flügel sind sein Markenzeichen.nMit seinem Rüssel saugt es süßen Honig aus Blumen.
Los dibujos de sus coloridas alas son muy peculiares.nLiba el néctar de las flores con su fina trompa.
Sulle ali ha splendidi, vividi colori. Succhia il dolcenpolline dai fiori allungando la bocca sottile.
Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature.nIt sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
色　鮮やかな　羽の　模様が　特徴。n細い　口を　伸ばしてn花の　甘い　ミツを　吸い取る。
ほそながい　くちを　つきさしてnあいての　たいえきを　すいとる。nこうげきてきな　せいかく。
가늘고 긴 입을 깊이 찔러n상대의 체액을 흡수한다.n공격적인 성격이다.
Il est très agressif. Il pique sa proie avec son longnmuseau étroit et absorbe sa vitalité.
Es besitzt ein aggressives Wesen. Es sticht seinennRüssel in seine Beute und saugt sie aus.
Es un Pokémon agresivo. Con su boca larga y afiladanataca a sus rivales para drenar sus fluidos.
Ha un’indole aggressiva. Conficca la sua boccanlunga e sottile nelle prede e ne succhia i fluidi.
It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with itsnlong, narrow mouth to drain the prey’s fluids.
長細い　口を　突き刺してn相手の　体液を　吸い取る。n攻撃的な　性格。
あまい　かふんが　だいこうぶつの　ポケモン。nはなを　つけた　はちうえを　まどべに　おけばnかふんを　あつめに　かならず　とんでくるよ。
달콤한 꽃가루를 매우 좋아하는 포켓몬이다.n꽃이 핀 화분을 창가에 두면n꽃가루를 모으려고 반드시 날아온다.

La nourriture préférée de Charmillon est le pollen sucréndes fleurs. Si on veut voir ce Pokémon, il suffit de laissernune fleur en pot sur un rebord de fenêtre. Charmillon viendransûrement voir s’il y a du pollen.

Papinellas Lieblingsspeise ist Blütenstaub. Wenn du diesesnPokémon beobachten möchtest, musst du bloß einennBlumentopf vor ein geöffnetes Fenster stellen. Papinellanwird sich diese Leckerei nicht entgehen lassen.

La comida favorita de Beautifly es el dulce polen de las flores.nSi quieres ver a este Pokémon, deja una maceta con flores alnlado de la ventana y verás cómo aparece un ejemplar denBeautifly en busca de polen.
Il nutrimento preferito da Beautifly è il polline dei fiori.nPer attirare questo Pokémon basta mettere una pianta fioritansul davanzale: senza dubbio si avvicinerà in cerca di polline.
Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If younwant to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by annopen window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
甘い　花粉が　大好物の　ポケモン。n花を　つけた　鉢植えを　窓辺に　置けばn花粉を　集めに　必ず　飛んでくるよ。
くるりと　まいた　はりの　ような　ながい　くちはnかふんを　あつめる　ときに　とても　べんり。nはるかぜに　のって　かふんを　あつめて　まわる。
둥글게 말린 바늘같이 생긴 긴 입은n꽃가루를 모을 때 매우 편리하다.n봄바람을 타고 꽃가루를 모으러 돌아다닌다.
Charmillon a une longue trompe en spirale, particulièrementnpratique pour récupérer le pollen des fleurs. Ce Pokémonnse laisse porter par les vents printaniers pendant qu’il butine.
Papinella hat einen langen Rüssel, der hervorragend zumnSammeln von Blütenpollen geeignet ist. Dieses Pokémonnflattert im Frühlingswind herum und sammelt Blütenstaub.
Beautifly tiene una boca enorme en espiral que parece unanaguja y le resulta muy útil para recolectar polen. EstenPokémon va revoloteando de flor en flor para recogerlo.
La bocca di Beautifly è costituita da un ago spiraliforme, moltonutile per succhiare il polline dai fiori. Questo Pokémon sinfa trasportare dal vento nei suoi viaggi alla ricerca del polline.
Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is verynconvenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémonnrides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
くるりと　巻いた　針の　ような　長い　口はn花粉を　集める　ときに　とても　便利。n春風に　乗って　花粉を　集めてまわる。
